title: ICE with GAT and TAIT: cannot relate region: LUB(ReEarlyBound(0, 'a), ReErased)

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust pub trait Trait { type Fut<'a> where Self: 'a; fn fun<'a, 'b>(&'a self, x: &'_ mut &'b ()) -> Self::Fut<'a> where 'b: 'a; } impl Trait for () { type Fut<'a> = impl ::std::future::Future + 'a where Self: 'a; fn fun<'a, 'b>(&'a self, x: &'_ mut &'b ()) -> Self::Fut<'a> where 'b: 'a, { async { } } } ``` ### Meta ******************************************************************************** Regression in 2287107588d92889d282e6cd3c1ca5df34cd34a5 (#98559) ****************************************************************************** searched nightlies: from nightly-2022-09-09 to nightly-2022-09-15 regressed nightly: nightly-2022-09-11 searched commit range: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/compare/1d37ed661a6922e7a167609b8cd7eb31e972b19b...2287107588d92889d282e6cd3c1ca5df34cd34a5 regressed commit: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/commit/2287107588d92889d282e6cd3c1ca5df34cd34a5
bisected with cargo-bisect-rustc v0.6.4 Host triple: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu Reproduce with: ```bash cargo bisect-rustc ice --prompt ```
Backtrace

``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_infer/src/infer/lexical_region_resolve/mod.rs:536:17: cannot relate region: LUB(ReEarlyBound(0, 'a), ReErased) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/750bd1a7ff3e010611b97ee75d30b7cbf5f3a03c/compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1458:9 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f5e49799c20 -
